title: Monitoring Quarkus runtime with DevUI
content: Quarkus now includes (since version 2.3.0) a Development UI (DevUI) which allows us to monitor runtime information about your extensions. Quarkus DevUI is an experimental feature you can use to collect inner details of your Quarkus environment. You can use for different purposes such as: Application introspection, to see the list of Beans / Observers ...  The post appeared first on .
